questions: Why has the ‘National Manufacturing Competitiveness Council’ been set up ?
answers: To improve the productivity, economist predict that manufacturing can achieve its target over the next decades.  1

questions: Why is the ‘least cost’ known as decision making factor for ideal location of an industry?
answers: Manufacturing activity tends to locate at the most appropriate place where all the factors of industrial  locations are either available or can be arranged at a lower cost.  1
Production of goods in large quantities after processing from raw materials to more valuable products is called as Manufacturing.

questions: Which factor has influenced Indian economy and standard of living of the people?
Name four main factors of production in modern industry.
answers: Raw material, Trained/specialised labour, Capital, Sources of power.
